events.message: I would like to request a refund for my recent order because the item arrived not as described and I am very disappointed.
The case has been categorized under refund due to customer's request for returning the item and getting their money back.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and assist the customer further with the process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like to get a refund. Let me assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund to help us process your request quickly?
The order number is 123456789. The product did not match the description and the quality was poor, so I want a full refund.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process and send you a prepaid return label shortly to return the item.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the refund offer and look forward to receiving the return label soon.
The refund has been successfully processed and you should see the amount reflected on your payment method within 5-7 business days.
We are following up to ensure your refund was received and to check if you need any further assistance from us.
Since your refund has been completed and there are no further issues, we are closing this support case. Thank you!
